contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 10th day of February, 1995, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The Order of the Superi- or Court is reversed, 432 Pa.Super. 31, 637 A.2d 648, and the matter is remanded to the Court of Common Pleas for disposition consistent with Terminato v. Pennsylvania National Insurance Company, 538 Pa. 60, 645 A.2d 1287 (1994).
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
